title: Amana Refrigerator Whirlpool EveryDrop3 Water Filter
description: Amana Refrigerator Whirlpool EveryDrop3 Water Filter ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 111 Reviews PartSelect Number PS11722128 Manufacturer Part Number EDR3RXD1 This EveryDrop Filter3 is certified to reduce the most contaminants with Triple Filtration Technology. Now, you and your family can enjoy the enriching benefits of cleaner, freshly filtered ice & water. Not just in beverages, but for preparing meals, too. This advanced generation of ice and water refrigerator filters from EveryDrop Filters are certified to reduce more contaminants with Triple Filtration Technology. Filter 5 reduces 16 contaminants, so you can feel reassured that you and your family are getting the most out of your water. Remember to replace your refrigerator filter every 6 months to maximize contaminant reduction.
symptoms: Ice maker dispenses too little ice
